CustomField.description: Formula field to return a translated version of Label__c if user is using Salesforce in a different language. Depending on userâ€™s language locale, can return Label__c, Label_Language_1__c, Label_Language_2__c, or Label_Language_3__c. Displayed in [VF page, Lightning Components].
CustomField.formula: CASE($Label.ampi__USER_LANGUAGE_CODE, '1', BLANKVALUE(ampi__Label_Language_1__c, ampi__Label__c), '2', BLANKVALUE(ampi__Label_Language_2__c, ampi__Label__c), '3', BLANKVALUE(ampi__Label_Language_3__c, ampi__Label__c), ampi__Label__c )
CustomField.label: Reporting Period Name Translated
